author: Bob Brigham
title: Turkey’s autocratic ruler could have leverage over a future GOP senator: report

sentence: Pennsylvania Senate candidate Mehmet Oz said Wednesday he will renounce his Turkish citizenship if elected to the U.S. Senate, reversing an earlier claim that he would maintain dual citizenship even if it meant forgoing classified briefings.
author: Chuck Ross
title: Dr. Oz Pledges to Cut All Ties to Foreign Powers, If Elected
NATO summit to address Russia’s invasion of Ukraine underway

sentence: | Riccardo Savi/Getty Images for Concordia Summit By Holly Otterbein and Natalie Allison 04/09/2022 06:44 PM EDT Updated: 04/09/2022 08:10 PM EDT Dr. Mehmet Oz has won the race for Donald Trump’s coveted endorsement in Pennsylvania’s Senate GOP primary.
title: Trump endorses Oz in key Senate race

sentence: In his statement, he noted that Oz was a well-known quantity who has “lived with us through the screen and has always been popular, respected, and smart.” “Perhaps most importantly, I believe that Mehmet Oz will be the one most able to win the General Election against a Radical Left Democrat looking to do unthinkable harm to our Country," he added.
author: Jill Colvin and Marc Levy
title: Trump backs Dr. Oz: Will Pennsylvania MAGA voters embrace it?

sentence: When undecided voters were asked they are leaning towards at this time, McCormick’s lead increased to 27.2%, followed by Mehmet Oz with almost 20.6%.
author: Karen Townsend
title: Why did Trump endorse Dr. Oz? One person's support may hold the answer
